changelog.title: CLH-006: File Operations
changelog.description: Create, copy, move, and delete files during field operations with mkdir, touch, cp, mv, rm.

changelog.title: CLH-007: Permissions & Access Control
changelog.description: Decode permission matrices. Use chmod to lock down sensitive mission files.

changelog.title: CLH-008: Shell Scripting Basics
changelog.description: Write and execute bash scripts. Earn CLI Engineer rank upon completion.
